description: This table contains basic information about a financial assistance case record.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the financial assistance case record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the record status (hidden, soft-deleted, etc...)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: EXTERNAL_ID
columns.description: This column stores the external unique identifier for a financial assistance case record.

columns.name: SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the service area in which this financial assistance case record was created.

columns.name: APPL_PROVIDED_DATE
columns.description: The date a financial assistance application was provided to the patient.

columns.name: APPL_SIGNED_DATE
columns.description: The date a completed and signed financial assistance application was submitted by the patient.

columns.name: FAMILY_SIZE
columns.description: The size of the patient's family when this case was created.

columns.name: PERCENT_FPL
columns.description: The percentage of federal poverty level of the patient calculated using income details (stored in FIN_ASST_CASE_INCOME table).

columns.name: PERCENT_FPL_AFTER_EXPENSES
columns.description: The percentage of federal poverty level of the patient calculated after subtracting expenses (stored in FIN_ASST_CASE_EXPENSE table) from income details (stored in FIN_ASST_CASE_INCOME table).

columns.name: TOTAL_ANNUAL_INCOME_AFTER_EXP
columns.description: The total income after expenses for the patient's household.

columns.name: STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status category ID for the financial assistance case record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


In Progress


Completed


Patient Started

columns.name: TOTAL_ANNUAL_INCOME
columns.description: Total annual income of the patient's household.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the guarantor record associated with the financial assistance case record.

columns.name: PROPENSITY_TO_PAY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The guarantor propensity to pay category ID for the financial assistance case record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CREDIT_SCORE
columns.description: The guarantor's credit score associated with the financial assistance case record.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_CASE_CRT_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The way this case record was created.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


User created


MyChart


Social Care


Batch


Background Process

columns.name: MYCHART_USER_ENTERED_CMT
columns.description: This column stores the free-text additional information provided with the financial assistance application by patient/requestor through MyChart.

columns.name: CREATED_BY_WPR_ID
columns.description: This item stores the user ID of the MyChart user who created this case. Only populated when the case is created through MyChart.

columns.name: CASE_CONTACT_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the guarantor account who is the primary contact for this financial assistance case record.

columns.name: TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The case type category ID for the financial assistance case record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Parent


Child

columns.name: CASE_WORKFLOW_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID of the workflow the financial assistance case record is created in.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Financial Assistance


Social Care


Reconciliation

columns.name: FISCAL_YEAR
columns.description: The fiscal year the financial information in the case record belongs to.

columns.name: NUMBER_OF_DEPENDENTS
columns.description: Number of dependents the patient for whom this financial assistance case record is for has.

columns.name: FPL_CALCULATION_DATE
columns.description: The date the federal poverty level stored in PERCENT_FPL and PERCENT_FPL_AFTER_EXPENSES columns was last calculated.
